mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_CALANDER ( CALANDER_ID, T_CALANDER_LIST_ID, SPOT_ID, CALANDER_START_TIME, CALANDER_END_TIME ) VALUES ( #{calanderId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{calanderListId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spotId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, TO_DATE(#{calanderStartTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), TO_DATE(#{calanderEndTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') )
mapper.select: SELECT C.CALANDER_ID, C.T_CALANDER_LIST_ID, C.SPOT_ID, TO_CHAR(C.CALANDER_START_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS START_TIME, TO_CHAR(C.CALANDER_END_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS END_TIME, V.LOCATION_NAME, V.LAT, V.LON FROM T_CALANDER C JOIN ( SELECT TO_CHAR(TOUR_ID) AS LOCATION_ID, TOUR_NAME AS LOCATION_NAME, TOUR_LAT AS LAT, TOUR_LON AS LON FROM T_TOUR UNION ALL SELECT TO_CHAR(ACCOMM_ID) AS LOCATION_ID, ACCOMM_NAME AS LOCATION_NAME, ACCOMM_LAT AS LAT, ACCOMM_LON AS LON FROM T_ACCOMM ) V ON TO_CHAR(C.SPOT_ID) = V.LOCATION_ID WHERE C.CALANDER_LIST_ID = #{listId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY C.CALANDER_START_TIME
